#summary Creates a login session or returns information about an existing login session for a user.
#labels Protocol-User

If a new session is being created, `SessionID` and `SecureSessionID` are randomly generated, while `LastLoginDate` is updated with the current timestamp in the user's account data.

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetSession||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user to create a login session for||UUID||Yes||
||`SceneID`||UUID of the scene this user session will start in||UUID||Optional||
||`SessionID`||Identifier to use for this session||UUID||Optional||
||`SecureSessionID`||Secure identifier to use for this session. Must only be transmitted across secure channels||UUID||Optional||

  * If SessionID or SecureSessionID are not specified, they will be randomly generated before the response is returned.

{{{
RequestMethod=GetSession
&UserID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if session data was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user this session belongs to||UUID||
||`SessionID`||Current session identifier||UUID||
||`SecureSessionID`||Current session identifier that must only be transmitted across secure channels||UUID||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":"true",
    "UserID":"efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0",
    "SessionID":"23e8bfa6-2123-4499-9670-9fe537e3e1f7",
    "SecureSessionID":"905e167a-0330-4b5c-9a1e-f940e2925303"
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message":"User does not exist"
}
}}}
